summary: At first, the strange phone messages promised great wealth. Soon, though, government agents pursue the young engineer receiving them around the world.
cast: Shane West|Edward Burns|Ving Rhames|Jonathan Pryce|Amara Zaragoza|Yuriy Kutsenko|Sergey Gubanov|Martin Sheen|Ilan Goodman|Todd Jensen|Steven Elder|Sandra De Sousa|Greg Donaldson|Andrea Enright|Trevor White|Dimitar Dimitrov|Danko Jordanov|Dancho Koleff|Vlado Mihailov|Velizar Peev|Atanas Srebrev|Mariana Stansheva|Mike Straub|Vee Vimolmal|Dimiter Doichinov|Sapphire Jule King|John Laskowski|Jan Loukota|Hristo Mitzkov|Richard Ng|Stanimir Stamatov
title: La conspiración del poder
